text: Carl Quintanilla (born September 10, 1970) is an American journalist and co- anchor of Squawk on the street and anchor of Squawk Alley, which is a morning programs on CNBC. == Early Life == Quintanilla was born in Midland, Michigan. When he was in high school, he interned at Westword Magazine in Denver in Michigan. == Education == Quintanilla is a political science student from University of Colorado Boulder. He later serve as a reporter in Daily Camera in Boulder from 1991 - 1993. == References == Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Journalists from Michigan Category:People from Midland, Michigan
title: Carl Quintanilla
